descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the geographic locations or their impact on Ghana and Mali.
Identifies the location of Ghana or Mali with limited accuracy.
Identifies the locations of Ghana and Mali and can name one geographic factor influencing their development.
Explains the geographic locations of Ghana and Mali and describes how physical features influenced settlement or trade.
Analyzes how the geographic factors significantly impacted the economic or political structures of Ghana and Mali.
Critically evaluates the long-term effects of geographic factors on the societal development and sustainability of Ghana and Mali.
Shows no awareness of the political organization in Ghana or Mali.
Names the rulers or types of government in Ghana or Mali with no supporting details.
Describes the basic political structure of either Ghana or Mali.
Compares the political structures of Ghana and Mali, identifying key differences and similarities.
Explains how political decisions or leadership impacted the stability and growth of Ghana and Mali.
Evaluates the effectiveness of the political systems in Ghana and Mali in addressing the needs of their societies and maintaining power.

Describes basic trading practices or key resources in Ghana or Mali.
Explains the significance of gold and salt trade in the economic prosperity of Ghana and Mali.
Analyzes the role of trade routes and economic policies in shaping the societies of Ghana and Mali.
Assesses the economic sustainability and impact of trade practices on the environment and social structures of Ghana and Mali.
